geekshop.controller

Class CartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • geekshop.controller.CartController

  • @Controller
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @SessionAttributes(value="cart")
class CartController
extends java.lang.Object
    A Spring MVC controller to manage the Cart.
    Author:
    Elizaveta Ragozina, Sebastian DÃ¶ring
